channel.title: [Dementhium 637] Item gives X2 Slayer exp

item.title: [Dementhium 637] Item gives X2 Slayer exp
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

I am trying to get an item to give X2 exp in slayer but I have no idea how I am going to use the getXPAmount() to give X2. I am using this

if (item != null && item.getDefinition().getName().contains("layer gloves")) { SlayerTask task; task.getXPAmount() *= 2; }

I never really try using the getter for something mathmatical. I would usually use a public int but now I need to know this. I want the getXPAmount() to be multiplied by 2

Here is the error when I used that

Compiling RS2Server... src\org\dementhium\model\npc\NPC.java:885: error: unexpected type task.getXPAmount() *= 2; ^ required: variable found: value

How do I get it to multiply by 2?

Read full topic
